articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India forecasts 7.3% economic growth, boosting Modi's election chances - CNBC
articles.description: Analysts said growth exceeding 7% for a third year in a row amid a global slowdown would help Modi to win a third term to rule Asia's third-largest economy.
articles.content: AYODHYA, INDIA - DECEMBER 30: Prime Minister Narendra Modi during road show at Rampath on December 30, 2023 in Ayodhya, India. Ahead of consecration ceremony of the Ram Lalla Temple in Ayodhya next m… [+3427 chars]

articles.title: Gautam Adani becomes richest person in Asia; beats Mukesh Ambani - Pune Pulse
articles.description: Gautam Adani, the billionaire and chairman of the Adani Group, has reclaimed the title of richest Indian and is now the richest person in Asia following a ruling by the Supreme Court in his favor during the hearing of petitions pertaining to the Adani-Hindenb…
